question: Which Indian {location} recorded the {stats} {col} levels for single-day in the past decade?
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data.dropna(subset="{code_col}")
    data = data.sort_values(by="{code_col}")
    val = data.iloc[{code_stats}]["{code_col}"]
    data = data[data["{code_col}"] == val]
    data = data.groupby("{code_location}").size().reset_index(name="count")
    data = data.sort_values(by="count")
    print(data.iloc[0]["{code_location}"])


true_code()
